sys_script.name: getNextObjNumberPadded

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_ltin2_uw_ai_fso_uw_case</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>getNextObjNumberPadded</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[			function getNextObjNumberPadded() {
				var assignOnInsert = gs.getProperty("glide.itil.assign.number.on.insert");
				if (assignOnInsert == 'true') {
					if (current.sys_id.isNil())
						return null;
				}

				var nm = new NumberManager(current.sys_meta.name);
				return nm.getNextObjNumberPadded();
			}

			function padObjNumber(number, digits) {
				var nm = new NumberManager();
				return nm.padObjNumber(number, digits);
			}
			]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rohit</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-04-16 08:23:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1974ba3f33fc6a90875176a59d5c7bdd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getNextObjNumberPadded</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="underwriter.ai" source="x_ltin2_uw_ai">5365c533935496d08b8674121bba10e7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="underwriter.ai">5365c533935496d08b8674121bba10e7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1974ba3f33fc6a90875176a59d5c7bdd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rohit</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-04-16 08:23:37</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1974ba3f33fc6a90875176a59d5c7bdd"/></record_update>
